actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 95-933.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the committee print entitled "Interlocking Directorates Among Major U.S. Corporations" as a Senate document.

summary.text: Directs the printing, as a Senate document, of the committee print of the Committee on Governmental Affairs entitled "Interlocking Directorates Among Major U.S. Corporations."

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the committee print entitled "Interlocking Directorates Among Major U.S. Corporations" as a Senate document.
